Uses of Class
communications.MessageType

  • Packages that use MessageType 
    Package Description
    communications
    Provides the classes necessary to represent any messages to be shared between entities and hippodrome regions.

    • Uses of MessageType in communications

      Fields in communications declared as MessageType 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private MessageType Message.type
      The type of this message
      Methods in communications that return MessageType 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MessageType Message.getType​()
      Gets the type of this Message.
      static MessageType MessageType.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static MessageType[] MessageType.values​()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Constructors in communications with parameters of type MessageType 
      Constructor Description
      Message​(MessageType type)
      Constructs a message which is only defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType).
      Message​(MessageType type, boolean value)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and a boolean value.
      Message​(MessageType type, int value)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and one integer value.
      Message​(MessageType type, int value1, int value2)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and two integer values.
      Message​(MessageType type, int value1, int value2, int value3)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and two integer values.
      Message​(MessageType type, int horseID, HorseJockeyState state)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType), one pair Horse/Jockey identification and one pair Horse/Jockey state value defined as HorseJockeyState.
      Message​(MessageType type, int spectatorID, SpectatorState state)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType), one Spectator identification and one Spectator state value defined as SpectatorState.
      Message​(MessageType type, BrokerState state)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and one Broker state value defined as BrokerState.
      Message​(MessageType type, Race race)
      Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType and a Race.
      UnexpectedReplyTypeException​(MessageType type)
      A meaningful and default exception followed by a simple message.
